resources.string: Dessert Shop
Category: Bread
Category: Cake
Category: Dessert
Light and flaky, layered traditional French pastry made using 100% New Zealand butter.
Each banana bread are individually baked in their own tray, perfect for tea time or after dinner treat.
The ideal accompaniment to a cup of coffee or tea, or served on a platter when friends pop over.
Fresh hand made bread with a center of sweet red bean paste.
Soft and fluffy bun filled with cinnamon sugar inside topped with a cream cheese icing.
Our Challah with Sesame is made fresh to order so it gets to you in the freshest condition.
Quick and easy, this delightful bread is filled with mouthwatering chocolatey goodness.
Brioche hot cross buns are made from an enriched buttery dough to give fluffy texture and aromatic smell.
Our Sourdough Roll has a thick and crunchy crust, making it perfect for a bowl of soup or dip for one!
The perfect side to a spag bol or lasagna on pasta night.

Our Almond Croissants are a match made in heaven with a delicious Frangipane filling and our award winning croissants. These are sure to brighten up your day! With a deliciously flaky crust and light, buttery texture inside, our Croissants are perfect for any occasion – breakfast, lunch, sweet, savoury – anything goes!
Made with 100% organic ingredients and completely free of animal products, our vegan banana bread is the fruit of careful consideration by its makers.
The perfect savoury scone made with high quality ingredients – best eaten warm spread liberally with butter! Soft and ever-so-slightly crumbly on the inside, and deliciously crispy on top.

Sweet red bean paste is also known as "adzuki bean paste", and used in many Japanese, Chinese and Korean foods. It has a nutty chocolaty flavour, and is very popular ingredient among desserts and confectionery in Asia.
An absolute bestseller. Cinnamon buns are made of rich, buttery yeasty dough and filled with cinnamon and sugar mixture. Finished with a creamy cheese sweet glaze.
A traditional Jewish bread. Soft with a touch of sweetness. Comes with two variations, poppy seeds and sesame seeds. Available every Friday.

Dark Callebaut chocolate chunks are folded into a white boule – one-third of the bread’s weight is chocolate! Many consider this bread as one of the most elegant, delicious and unique breads they have ever tasted. Try toasting it so the chocolate starts to melt with a little butter spread on top or serve as dessert with ice cream or berries and fresh whipped cream. Be prepared to swoon.
In case you knead another reason to devour our Traditional Hot Cross Buns, they’re made with real fruit, delicious spice mix and no bitter orange peel!
A classic breakfast bread perfect to start your morning every day especially paired with your favourite morning coffee.

A savoury twisted bread with a tasty triple cheese melt, crusted with cheese and garlic gratings to give a toasted, crunchy coating. This bread is great to share. Just tear off a twist and eat. Great for dipping and filling. This bread is crafted from 100% nz flour and baked fresh in store.
A light vanilla sponge cake, with three layers of mango fresh cream.
Vanilla sponge layered with rum syrup, chocolate ganache and coffee flavoured cream.
Vanilla sponge layered with strawberry flavoured cream and natural strawberry filling.
Our famous Chocolate cake is filled and topped with Whittakers ganache.
A customer favourite cake finished with chocolate glaze and chocolate dipped strawberries.
One of our best selling cakes topped with fresh seasonal fruit.
Add magic to your celebration with this delicious cookies and cream cake!
Chocolate sponge layered with vanilla flavoured cream and hand-crushed sour cherries.
Celebrate your birthday with one of our special birthday cake!
French traditional strawberry cake with vanilla mousseline cream.

Our mango cake is made from real mango puree combined with super soft vanilla chiffon layers. This cake is made with vanilla chiffon cake, mango mousse and real mango chunks. Decorated with white cream masking, cream piping real mango chunks, silver sugar balls, edible gold leaves and a cute mint leaf.
Filled with layers of cream cheese, crème anglaise, and an Irish coffee liqueur soaked sponge, our Tiramisu cake is coated in butter cream and finished with a dusting of cocoa and Belgian chocolates.
Delicious chiffon sponge cake filled with fresh cream, fresh strawberry slices and strawberry jam. Decorated with fresh strawberries, fresh cream piping, silver sugar balls and edible gold leaf.

Nothing more decadent than a chocolate cake made with real 52% couverture Belgium chocolate and then layered with chocolate ganache and then topped with handcrafted chocolate shards. Only the finest chocolate goes into making this beauty!

This is the ultimate rich and fudgey chocolate cake. A rich mouth-watering chocolate mud cake made from premium French chocolate with a chocolate ganache coating and a dusting of cocoa powder on top, this is the ultimate cake for chocolate lovers.

Coming up with one of the finest tastes, this is going to make your taste buds climb up to an unforgettable experience. Made of three rich and smooth creamy layers packed with the tropical fruits and all time favourite Kiwi, this cake is sure to relish your sweet tooth fruity desires with its exotic fruit delight.

A match made in heaven - Cookies and cream. A dreamy chocolate cake with cookies and cream buttercream and topped with oreo and dollops of whipped cream. Get creative with your drizzle colour and dig in!

It is time to notch up your celebration by getting a dainty black forest cake in almost 60 minutes to your place. This will satisfy your sweet cravings, and you would love to delight your beloved ones with the lip-smacking flavours crafted with rich ingredients.
Get ready for some sweet celebrations with this birthday cake! Everyone deserves a special celebration. Make each birthday unforgettable with this exclusive Happy Birthday cake.
This lovely cake is enriched with fresh homemade vanilla strawberry cake layers, creamy vanilla filling, and was topped with our fluffy whipped frosting.
A decadent treat to share anytime.
Rich and fluffy chocolate cupcakes topped with flavorful strawberry frosting.
Classic chocolate chip cookies perfect to brighten your day.
Newly added homemade cookie sandwich filled with delicious cream.
Hongkong egg tarts filled with smooth lightly sweetened egg.
Small, delicate meringue-based cookies perfect as a small snack.
Newly added flavours for our customers favourite macaroon cookies.
Handmade all time childhood cookies favourite.
Make celebration better with our cupcake topped with cream and sprinkles.
Baked to perfection topped with delicious light whipped cream.

These tasty little tarts, with their sweet, ground almond filling, are a wonderful finish to a light summer meal. Our tart are topped with almonds with a delicious chocolate drizzle best served with sliced fresh peaches and whipped cream to make them extra-special.
These luxurious chocolate strawberry cupcakes have rich chocolate and soft strawberry sponge. Topped with pink strawberry buttercream and finished with a fresh strawberry.
These deliciously chewy cookies are made with our secret blend of plant-based ingredients - organic quinoa and coconut flours are baked with organic coconut oil and fair trade vegan dark chocolate.
These are super chewy and delicious! Our triple choc cookies are filled with chunks of chocolate and are filled with caramel and our signature vanilla bean butter cream.
Freshly baked egg tarts with buttery base and soft egg custard inside. Pastry flour makes it spongy combines with milk-egg make harmony flavor, attract customers.

The Paris macaron, the essential ingredient of French pastry, is a must on every table. For a snack, as a dessert or to accompany coffee, there are plenty of opportunities to share a box of macarons. Between a symphony of colours and a mix of textures that delight the palate, macarons are simply incomparable.
Treat yourself with these light tasty macarons perfect to enjoy daily or share it with your friends to create fond memories together.

Our alluring and firm Peanut Cookies with a salty aftertaste is the perfect treat for all peanut lovers! Our Peanut Butter Oat Cookies are vegan and refined sugar-free, meaning they’re perfect for every occasion where cookies are necessary.
Vanilla cupcake topped with a light whipped cream and decorated with sprinkles. Perfect for celebrations and sunny days to cheer you up!
One of our best seller and all time customer favourite chocolate cupcake topped with a delicious whip cream and grated dark chocolate with some almond nuts.
